component.name: AI Auto Commit
component.summary: AI-powered git commit and push tool with interactive setup

description.p: An intelligent, AI-powered git commit and push tool that automatically generates meaningful commit messages from your staged changes. Works with multiple AI providers including OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Mistral, and Cohere.

ul.li: AI-Powered Commit Messages: Automatically generates conventional commit messages
Multi-Provider Support: Works with OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Mistral, and Cohere
Token Budget Management: Configurable token limits to control API costs
Interactive Setup: User-friendly wizard for first-time configuration
Smart Diff Analysis: Uses hierarchical analysis to understand complex changes
Safety Features: Creates backups and verifies changes before committing

description.p: Initial release with interactive setup wizard and multi-provider support.

ul.li: Support for 5 AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Mistral, Cohere)
